Interface DataAnalyser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseController

    public interface DataAnalyser
    Interface defining methods required for a class to provide AI functionality, both for queries and stock analysis

    • Method Detail

      • favouriteStocks

        java.util.ArrayList<Stock> favouriteStocks(int days)
        To get a list of the most queried stocks over the last x days
        Parameters:
        days - no. of days of queries to search
        Returns:
        list of favourite stocks, sorted by "most common first"
